price: 50. Nabii Muusa:ni-Rabbi usuk ummaan ginoh le-weelo yeceeh, tohuk lakal tuxxiq teetik edde yanim teetih yescesse Rabbi kinni kaak iyye.
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَعۡطَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلۡقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbunā alladhī aʿṭā kulla shayin khalqahu thumma hadā
